name: mcp-server-aws-documentation
description: AWS documentation access with search, content recommendations, and markdown conversion

rating.reason: All three tools demonstrate excellent documentation quality. The tool names are specific and clear ('read_documentation', 'search_documentation', 'recommend'). Each description is comprehensive with 3-4 detailed sections covering functionality, usage context, and practical guidance. The parameter documentation is thorough, including clear descriptions, appropriate constraints, and helpful context. The tools go beyond basic functionality to provide usage tips, examples, and detailed explanations of how to interpret results. This level of detail proactively addresses user questions and demonstrates exceptional documentation standards.
